root.name: Resident Evil: Chronicles HD Collection
root.description: OverviewResident Evil: Chronicles HD Collection is an HD port of both Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles and Resident Evil: The Darkside Chronicles. The port was first revealed at Captivate 2012 and was developed by Cavia, developer of the original titles. The game is a Playstation exclusive and can only be played with the Playstation Move.Chronicles HD Collection features new, remastered HD visuals as well as Move support and Sharpshooter support. The game is otherwise identical to the Wii version and doesn't feature any new levels or modes.
